full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: EZ976-231756 Building Conditions Report SOA

**Tender Details**

* Reference Number: WS4441334334-Doc4441376725
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: WS4441334334
* Publication Date: February 16, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 29, 2024 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: March 1, 2024
* Tender Status: Cancelled

**Procurement Information**

* Procurement Category: Services
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Scope of Work**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting consulting firms with expertise in architectural or engineering services to provide standing offers for various projects in British Columbia and Yukon territories. The selected consultants will provide a range of services, including structural and architectural engineering services, for building projects.

**Trade Agreements**

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contracting Entity and End User**

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity Address: Same as above

**Contact Information**

* Contact Person: Lam, Tian (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18775270?
